extension.summary: Studio Icons – A clean, unified pack that makes your Kodi library shine
extension.description: Bring your Kodi library to life with Color Studio Icons – Coloured and Modded. This addon delivers a full suite of studio logos in bold, uniform designs, ensuring your media collection looks sharp, consistent, and up-to-date across all versions of Kodi.
